1
TEAM-UP: GHOST RIDER, RED HULK, VENOM: If one or more listed friendly characters are on the map, X-23 and the listed friendly characters have SAFEGUARD: Mystics team ability and can reduce penetrating damage dealt by opposing characters with the Monster keyword.

February 19, 2021
Goop
Charge exploit blades for 50 points is great. Unfortuantely the rest of her dial is a little bland. Luckily the healing might take her back up to that sweet sweet top click which is what you really want to be on.
July 22, 2020
mc268
This is a good dial for the character. A healing factor trait, traited toughness and indom are great to see. She also has good stats and a power set that manages to reflect all the powers she should have (except regen) at some point on the dial for a low cost. I wish she had regen on her last click though.
